thread.title: Anne V sports Chicago Cubs-themed body paint - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Anne V sports Chicago Cubs-themed body paint - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: Anne V sports Chicago Cubs-themed body paint - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Wed Oct. 21, 2015 As you all know, the Cubs and Mets are facing off tonight for a chance to go to the World Series. With a Mets victory, they'll sweep the series—but this morning, we discovered the good luck charm that just might give the Chicago-based team a much-needed shot of adrenaline.
Back in 2005, we created a piece called "Uniform Appeal," where some of our favorite girls of all time were body-painted in iconic jerseys. Among those was the one and only Anne V decorated in those famous pinstripes, like you've never seen them before.
• Erin Heatherton is the sexiest ceremonial pitcher we've ever seen
We don't know if the Cubs can come back from a 0-3 deficit, but we're pretty sure seeing Anne V in nothing but Cubs-themed body paint will have the team walking away feeling victorious regardless of tonight's outcome.
Be sure to tune your TV to TBS tonight at 8:07pm EST, to see if the Cubs can pull out their first W of the National League Championship Series.
BONUS: See the ladies of SI Swimsuit 2015 in nothing but body paint!
